form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION TO FILE PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION, N-400 ( (Rev. 5-2-82) Y

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/31/2023 letterson J 2 6/4/24, UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE OMB NO. 1115-0009 IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE Approval Expires 1/31/84 FEE STAMP APPLICATION TO FILE PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION 6-4-84 Mail or take to: 9100 IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE 83062 ALIEN REGISTRATION 2 Show the exact spelling of your name as it appears on your alien registration (See INSTRUCTIONS. BE SURE YOU UNDERSTAND EACH receipt card, and the number of your card. If you did not r√©gister, so state.) QUESTION BEFORE YOU ANSWER IT.
